title: A Day at The Bridge Hamptons by Stephen Landau
description: As I barrel down the expressway in an 83’ Porsche 911, the steering wheel in my left hand and camera in my right, my lens is pointed towards a grotesque Tesla Cybertruck towing a factory-built Renault Clio race car. John Sharkey of Express Diagnostics is at the wheel of the Braun razor blade with wheels as Anthony Randazzo, owner of the Clio, sits shotgun. We are on our way to “The Bridge”, one of the most exclusive automotive events on the East Coast. It’s an invite-only affair, created by Bob Rubin, Shamin Abas, and Jeffrey Einhorn. Continue...
